Make new Posts

Instructions on making new posts.
Author

Quarto

Published

May 22, 2021

make a new post

Add a new post to your blog by creating a sub-directory within posts, and adding an index.qmd file to the directory. That qmd file is the new blog post and when you render that, the blog home page will automatically update to include the newest post at the top of the listing.

Go to posts/ create a folder, inside folder create index.qmd, render the file.

Publish Quarto blog

GitHub pages

    1. create a file touch .nojekyll in the repository
    1. create a folder docs/
    1. create a file inside docs/
project:
  type: website
  output-dir: docs
    1. in GitHub settings, Branch: main and Select folder /docs

Netlify

  • set publish directory to the output directory. Set the Publish directory: _site
